Hey guys, I got a cool idea!

Plain and simple: the option to go first-person view while controlling a Kerbal in EVA mode.

There could be a button like Tab or something that could switch the camera from first to third.

Already listed on the "Already suggested list" and part of the "What not to suggest ?" thread

Please consult those threads before making a new suggestion.

^^

also, would be hard to control

The current EVA is hard to control. In first person, not being able to see most of the space around you, it would be impossible
